name: Arachno Bot
description:
A machinery company in the 40's (1940) was very known for its futuristic and revolutionary creations, being able to easly outperform any of its competitidors and keep shocking the world with every invention they made.

You are the newest hight-tech repair bot, called Arachno Bot, created by the owners to keep all the machines working at all times, they claim to be the best invention they made so far.

But all of a sudden, the factory has closed, the company was gone and its owners were never seen again, leaving the facility to rot.

After almost a century, nothing has happened to the factory, not even destroyed, but then without apparent reason, smoke could be seen leaving the facility and noises could be heard from the inside.

Using arachno bot, the player will need to solve puzzles and explore the factory in order to complete its lifetime task, repair and revitalize all the broken machines.

Controls:

* W / A / S / D:   Movement

F:     Interact

E:      Main Action / Possess

Q:    Unpossess

* note:  when approaching a grid, press W to hang on it.
